Body: On my new phone, for security reasons I decided to stick to Open Source apps as much as possible.Is there an Open Source flashlight app?The most popular flashlight apps (1,2) are asking for crazy permissions: GPS, camera, Internet, GPS, SD card...If no Open Source is available, at least one I would be happy with a very simple one, such as this one (white screen, brightness 100%, lock screen) which for some reason is not available for my new phone.
Title: Open source flashlight app?

history.Text: On my new phone, for security reasons I decided to stick to Open Source apps as much as possible.Is there an Open Source flashlight app?The most popular flashlight apps ([1][1],[2][2]) are asking for crazy permissions: GPS, camera, Internet, GPS, SD card...If no Open Source is available, at least one I would be happy with a very simple one, such as [this one][3] (white screen, brightness 100%, lock screen) which for some reason is not available for my new [phone][4].  [1]: https://market.android.com/details?id=goldenshorestechnologies.brightestflashlight.free  [2]: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.devuni.flashlight  [3]: https://market.android.com/details?id=org.dyndns.devesh.flashlight  [4]: http://www.gsmarena.com/huawei_u8150_ideos-3513.php
